decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: 2209-P/L&S/01 (Location and Site Plans), 2209-P/EX/02 (Existing Rear Elevation), 2209-P/EX/01 (Existing Front Elevations), 2209-P/P/01 (Proposed Front Elevations), 2209-P/P/02 (Proposed Rear Elevation, Rev A 02.03.2023), 2209-P/DL-D/01 (Cross Section Details of New External Door ED1), 2209-P/W-F+S/01 (Window Schedule First and Second Floors), 2209-P/W&ED-G/01 (Window and External Door Schedule), 2209-P/DL-W/01 (Cross Section Details of New Windows GW1 &2 , Rev A 09.03.2023), 2209-P/DL-W/02 (Cross Section Details of New Windows GW3-5, FW1-5 & SW1, Rev A 09.03.2023), Design and Access Statement, dated 12.01.2023.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B & 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 & HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
description: Replacement of windows from timber single glazed to double glazed, timber framed; replacement of existing rear elevation door from timber single glazed to double glazed timber framed
